information: BEEZ is a company involved in the import-export of organic foodstuffs from Peru. We have several activities: • import-export of organic foods. BEEZ also imports 100% natural organic foods and food supplements from Peru. We also export organic raw materials and foods. We export from France to serve markets in Europe, and from Peru for markets in other parts of the world. Our clients are retailers: organic stores, specialist food stores, delicatessen stores. • Wholesaler of organic foodstuffs. BEEZ operates as a wholesaler for companies that need to obtain large quantities of ingredients, in the form of foods and farm produce, for processing to make their finished products. Our clients are companies operating in the food industry and the cosmetics sector. • Distribution of organic foods. BEEZ distributes its own brands of organic products and the brands it represents in the distribution networks. • BEEZ is certified by Ecocert.
